name: sys::net::connection::socket::TcpListener::bind::inner

sys::net::connection::socket::setsockopt.doc:
Sets the value of a socket option.

 # Safety
 `T` must be the type associated with the given socket option.

sys::pal::unix::cvt.doc:
Converts native return values to Result using the *-1 means error is in `errno`*  convention.
 Non-error values are `Ok`-wrapped.
